pr_title: feat(griffin): insert statement accepts timestamp as string in both micro- and milli formats.

timeline.message: feat(griffin): insert statement accepts timestamp as string in both micro- and milli formats.
chore(griffin): return value rather than throw exception

timeline.author: jaugsburger
